Punch.help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet. Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Haymaker.help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback. Recharge: Moderate

Foot_Stomp.help: Marauder shakes the very Earth itself with a super Foot Stomp, attacking everything in a nearby area. Recharge: Slow

Nova_Fist_Tell.help: Marauder slams the ground, activating a wave of Nova energy which devastates all enemies around him! Note that Nova Fist is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow
Nova_Fist_Tell.attackerAttackFloater: Nova Fist! Back away from Marauder!

Nova_Fist_Punch.help: Marauder slams the ground, activating a wave of Nova energy which devastates all enemies around him!

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} blasts you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of energy damage!
{PlayerSource} blasts you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of energy damage!

Unstoppable.help: When Marauder activates this power, he not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off he is left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.shortHelp: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG)
Unstoppable.targetShortHelp: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG)

Call_Artillery.help: Marauder's Artillery Barrage has slowed you and significantly reduced your damage. Get closer to Marauder where it can't hit you!

Berserker_Rage.help: When Marauder enters his Berserker Rage, his resistance to damage, recovery, accuracy, and damage are all greatly increased. Only the Pacification Grenade could possibly calm him down.
